import React, {useState,useEffect} from 'react' import { Link,useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import products from '../products' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import axios from 'axios' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { listProductDetails } from '../actions/productActions' function ProductScreen() { const {id} = useParams(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [product, setProduct] = useState([]); useEffect(()=> { // async function fetchProduct() { // const { data } = await axios.get(`/ap/products/${id}`) // setProduct(data) // } // fetchProduct() dispatch(listProductDetails()) },[]) return (
Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: ${product.description} Prices: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In stock' : 'Out of Stock'}
) } export default ProductScreen
